properties.name: t1.kafka.session-timeout-ms
properties.description: Defines the timeout in ms for kafka session.

properties.name: t1.kafka.max-partition-fetch-bytes
properties.description: Defines the max value in bytes for kafka partition.

properties.name: t1.kafka.max-poll-interval-ms
properties.description: Defines max poll interval in ms for kafka.

properties.name: t1.kafka.topic.t1_demo_metrics
properties.description: Describes the name for kafka topic t1_demo_metrics.

properties.name: t1.aop.error-log
properties.description: Enable/disable aspect error log and checks the existence of database table.

properties.name: t1.aop.log-metric
properties.description: Enable/disable the counting method's execution time aspect.
